fields_of_interest: Trade, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Energy policy, clean transport, sustainable shipping, digital transport, smart energy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: EUGINE, Conferation of Finnish Industries, Federation of Finnish Technology Industries, Eurelectric, SolarPowerEurope, EEF, Cogen Europe, Euromot
goals__remit: Wärtsilä is a global leader in smart technologies and complete lifecycle solutions for the marine and energy markets. By emphasising sustainable innovation, total efficiency and data analytics, Wärtsilä maximises the environmental and economic performance of the vessels and power plants of its customers. In 2017, Wärtsilä's net sales totalled EUR 4.9 billion with approximately 18,000 employees. The company has operations in over 200 locations in more than 80 countries around the world. Wärtsilä is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki.
